channel.title: aba sensitivity on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in aba sensitivity on funPlantGenes

item.title: CaAIRE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA05g17640 Gene Symbol: CaAIRE1 Gene Name: ABA Induced RING-type E3 ligase 1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Pepper E3 ligase CaAIRE1 promotes ABA sensitivity and drought tolerance by degradation of protein phosphatase CaAITP1.

item.title: CaHDZ12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaHDZ12 Gene Name: Homeodomain-Leucine Zipper (HD-Zip) I Transcription Factor12 Genome: Species: Cicer arietinum Functional Descriptions: Chickpea WRKY70 Regulates the Expression of a Homeodomain-Leucine Zipper (HD-Zip) I Transcription Factor CaHDZ12, which Confers Abiotic Stress Tolerance in Transgenic Tobacco and Chickpea.

item.title: CsATAF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa4M361820.1 Gene Symbol: CsATAF1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsATAF1 Positively Regulates Drought Stress Tolerance by an ABA-Dependent Pathway and by Promoting ROS Scavenging in Cucumber.

item.title: FaPYR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaPYR1 Gene Name: abscisic acid receptor PYR1 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: Down-regulation of the FaPYR1 gene not only significantly delayed fruit ripening, but also markedly altered ABA content, ABA sensitivity, and a set of ABA-responsive gene transcripts, including ABI1 and SnRK2.

item.title: GhWRKY17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhWRKY17 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 17 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The Cotton WRKY Transcription Factor GhWRKY17 Functions in Drought and Salt Stress in Transgenic Nicotiana benthamiana Through ABA Signaling and the Modulation of Reactive Oxygen Species Production.

item.title: MdCAIP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000118899 Gene Symbol: MdCAIP1 Gene Name: C2-domain ABA Insensitive Protein1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: An Apple Protein Kinase MdSnRK1.

item.title: MdCIPK22
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000154855 Gene Symbol: MdCIPK22 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica genome GDDH13 v 1.

item.title: MdRAV1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD16G1047700 Gene Symbol: MdRAV1 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica genome GDDH13 v 1.

item.title: MdSAT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdSAT1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Apple MdSAT1 encodes a bHLHm1 transcription factor involved in salinity and drought responses.

item.title: MdSHINE2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000178263 Gene Symbol: MdSHINE2 Gene Name: AP2/EREBP transcription factor 2 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Apple AP2/EREBP transcription factor MdSHINE2 confers drought resistance by regulating wax biosynthesis.

item.title: MdSnRK1.1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000191788 Gene Symbol: MdSnRK1.1 Gene Name: SNF1-related protein kinase 1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: An Apple Protein Kinase MdSnRK1.

item.title: MeCatalase1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Me.05G130500 Gene Symbol: MeCatalase1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: The chaperone MeHSP90 recruits MeWRKY20 and MeCatalase1 to regulate drought stress resistance in cassava.

item.title: MeWRKY20
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Me.15G118300 Gene Symbol: MeWRKY20 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: The chaperone MeHSP90 recruits MeWRKY20 and MeCatalase1 to regulate drought stress resistance in cassava.

item.title: OsNPC3
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os11g38050 RAPdb gene ID: Os11g0593000 Gene Symbol: OsNPC3 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: PalWRKY77
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PalWRKY77 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus alb Functional Descriptions: The PalWRKY77 transcription factor negatively regulates salt tolerance and abscisic acid signaling in Populus.

item.title: SlAN11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlAN11 Gene Name: TRANSPARENT TESTA GLABRA 1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Tomato SlAN11 regulates flavonoid biosynthesis and seed dormancy by interaction with bHLH proteins but not with MYB proteins.

item.title: SlDAO2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc02g068320 Gene Symbol: SlDAO2 Gene Name: DIOXYGENASE FOR AUXIN OXIDATION2 Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: SlPP2C3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc06g076400.2.1 Gene Symbol: SlPP2C3 Gene Name: Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: SlUGT75C1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc09g092500 Gene Symbol: SlUGT75C1 Gene Name: UDP-glycosyltransferase 75C1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlUGT75C1 catalyzes the glucosylation of both ABA and IAA in vitro| SlUGT76E1 can only catalyze the conjugation of ABA| and SlUGT73C4 cannot glycosylate either ABA or IAA.

item.title: TaAFP-A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS2A02G176300 Gene Symbol: TaAFP-A Gene Name: antifreeze protein Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: TaAFP-B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS2B02G202700 Gene Symbol: TaAFP-B Gene Name: ninja-family protein 1 Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: TaAFP-D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS2D02G183700 Gene Symbol: TaAFP-D Gene Name: Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: TaASR1-D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS4D02G109500 Gene Symbol: TaASR1-D Gene Name: abscisic acid-stress-ripening1 Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: TaCIPK23
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaCIPK23 Gene Name: CBL-interacting protein kinase 23 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Wheat CBL-interacting protein kinase 23 (TaCIPK23) positively regulates drought stress and ABA responses TaCIPK23-overexpression wheat and Arabidopsis showed an higher survival rate under drought conditions with enhanced germination rate, developed root system, increased accumulation of osmolytes, and reduced water loss rate.

item.title: TaGBF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaGBF1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: The wheat TaGBF1 gene is involved in the blue-light response and salt tolerance.

item.title: TaMPK3-4A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS4A02G106400 Gene Symbol: TaMPK3-4A Gene Name: Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: TaMPK3-4D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS4D02G198600 Gene Symbol: TaMPK3-4D Gene Name: Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: TaNAC48
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS1B02G274300 Gene Symbol: TaNAC48 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: TaNAC48 positively regulates drought tolerance and ABA responses in wheat (Triticum aestivum L.

item.title: TaOPR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaOPR1 Gene Name: Oxophytodienoate Reductase 1 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Wheat Oxophytodienoate Reductase Gene TaOPR1 Confers Salinity Tolerance via Enhancement of Abscisic Acid Signaling and Reactive Oxygen Species Scavenging.

item.title: TaPYL1-1B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS1B02G206600 Gene Symbol: TaPYL1-1B Gene Name: Polyketide cyclase / dehydrase and lipid transport 1 Genome: Chinese_Spring1.
